item.title: StackOverflow 精选 - SSR vs Code Splitting
item.description: 原文地址 The pros and cons of react ssr with code splitting and now React.Lazy I am slightly confused about the merits of ssr and code splitting and and code splitting done solely on the client. My thoughts are that server rendering the page first will lead to
